scripts.deploy: npm run build && gh-pages -d dist -r https://github.com/Puhi8/me
scripts.img: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const fsp=fs.promises;const root=process.cwd();const src=path.join(root,'img');const dest=path.join(root,'public','img');(async()=>{if(!fs.existsSync(src)){console.log('No img directory to move.');return;}async function move(fromDir,toDir){await fsp.mkdir(toDir,{recursive:true});const entries=await fsp.readdir(fromDir,{withFileTypes:true});for(const entry of entries){const from=path.join(fromDir,entry.name);const to=path.join(toDir,entry.name);if(entry.isDirectory()){await move(from,to);await fsp.rmdir(from).catch(()=>{});}else if(entry.isFile()){await fsp.mkdir(toDir,{recursive:true});await fsp.rename(from,to);}}}await fsp.mkdir(dest,{recursive:true});await move(src,dest);await fsp.rmdir(src).catch(()=>{});console.log('Images moved to public/img');})().catch(err=>{console.error('Failed to move images:',err.message);process.exit(1);});"
scripts.profile: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const fsp=fs.promises;const root=process.cwd();const src=path.join(root,'profile.png');const destDir=path.join(root,'public','img');const dest=path.join(destDir,'profile.png');(async()=>{if(!fs.existsSync(src)){console.log('No profile.png found at project root.');return;}await fsp.mkdir(destDir,{recursive:true});await fsp.rename(src,dest);console.log('profile.png moved to public/img/profile.png');})().catch(err=>{console.error('Failed to move profile:',err.message);process.exit(1);});"
scripts.moveImg: npm run img && npm run profile
